content:
After some preparation, I start to organize this working group. See more on website
We are open to everyone joining.
Now I made a recent schedule of Introduction. But we still need to decide on a long-term plan. So feel free to comment here or our discord.
Cool! Is the focus on physics or on cohesive toposes?
I personally more care about cohesive topos since I don't know much about physics. However, I would glad to learn some physics if there are people with physics backgrounds joining.
I do have physics background, but it don't really understand the work. That's what I'm hoping to get from this group

I don't understand two things: when is the first meeting and about what topic? And, what should I do if I want to contribute with a talk, considering that I can only talk about topos theory, and that's already wishful thinking? :grinning:
Still need to figure out when people are free, and how exactly we are going to proceed. It's being discussed in the discord!
And regarding talks, I think topos theory would be great. I believe the present plan is to power through a short bunch of talks on topos theory, HoTT and geometry. But that isn't final yet
Hi all, I wish someone would be interested in discussing this with me at this point.
